title: [White Haven, Pacioli's Room]
description: Rich black walnut paneling and careful molding give this room a sense of luxury.  Light from a fish oil lamp shines upon a desk covered with runes and piled with books.  Built into the wall behind the desk are massive shelves holding hundreds of volumes covering all aspects of magic.  A white puma rug lays in front of a corner fireplace and hand tooled leather chairs are placed against the wall near a fireplace.  In an alcove is a humble bed which seems out of place amid the other luxurious furnis

Rich black walnut paneling and careful molding give this room a sense of luxury.  Light from a fish oil lamp shines upon a desk covered with runes and piled with books.  Built into the wall behind the desk are massive shelves holding hundreds of volumes covering all aspects of magic.  A white puma rug lays in front of a corner fireplace and hand tooled leather chairs are placed against the wall near a fireplace.  In an alcove is a humble bed which seems out of place amid the other furnishings.
